attributes.action: help home-owners facing repossession and thereby help the British economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bank of England should create a subsidiary bank who only lends money to home-owner facing repossession at around 4% apr fixed for the life of mortgage. Albeit, some selection criteria must be applied to ensure that home-owner does whatever he/she can to avoid repossession. This will provide breathing space to home-owner and bank of England is exposed to a limited debt.
